text:
## ✅ **App Rebranding Complete!**

Successfully updated the app name from **"AutoDx"** to **"VisibleDx"** throughout the entire application:

### **Updated Files (22 instances total):**

**🔧 Core Application Files:**
- `/app/layout.tsx` - Main page title
- `/app/criteria-engine/page.tsx` - Clinical report headers
- `/app/new-patient/page.tsx` - SOAP report headers and footers
- `/components/disclaimer.tsx` - About section, version info, copyright
- `/components/navigation.tsx` - Menu titles and descriptions

**🌍 Translation Files (All 7 Languages):**
- `/lib/translations/en.ts` - English
- `/lib/translations/nl.ts` - Dutch  
- `/lib/translations/da.ts` - Danish
- `/lib/translations/de.ts` - German
- `/lib/translations/sv.ts` - Swedish
- `/lib/translations/no.ts` - Norwegian
- `/lib/translations/fr.ts` - French

**📄 Documentation:**
- `/MULTILINGUAL_README.md` - Updated branding references

### **Changes Made:**
- ✅ Browser tab title now shows "VisibleDx: ME/CFS · Long COVID · POTS"
- ✅ All clinical reports now header as "VisibleDx Clinical Decision Support Report" 
- ✅ About section in footer updated to "About VisibleDx"
- ✅ Version info shows "VisibleDx v1.0"
- ✅ Copyright notice updated to "© 2024 VisibleDx"
- ✅ Navigation menu shows "VisibleDx Menu"
- ✅ All language translations updated consistently

### **Verification:**
- ✅ Build succeeds without errors
- ✅ No remaining "AutoDx" references found
- ✅ All 22 "VisibleDx" references confirmed in correct locations

The app is now fully rebranded as **VisibleDx** while maintaining all functionality and translations!
